TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit UIGraphics extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Helper methods to paint on the screen, PDF context or bitmaps.

remarks.para: Methods in this class generally correspond to UIGraphics* and UIRect* methods in Apple's UIKit Framework.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void AddPDFContextDestination (string str, MonoTouch.CoreGraphics.CGPoint point);
.method public static hidebysig void AddPDFContextDestination(string str, valuetype MonoTouch.CoreGraphics.CGPoint point) cil managed

Docs.param: Name of destination point.
A point in the current context.
Docs.summary: Adds a PDF destination with the given name at the given position.
Docs.remarks: Only valid if the current graphics context is a PDF context

MemberSignature.Value: public static void BeginImageContext (MonoTouch.CoreGraphics.CGSize size);

.method public static hidebysig pinvokeimpl ("/System/Library/Frameworks/UIKit.framework/UIKit" as "UIGraphicsBeginImageContext" winapi)void BeginImageContext(valuetype MonoTouch.CoreGraphics.CGSize size) cil managed

Docs.param: Size of the image context.
Docs.summary: Pushes a new image context and makes it the current graphics context.

remarks.para: UIKit keeps a stack of image context, this method creates a new image context, makes it the default and places it at the top of the graphic context stacks.
To restore the previous graphics context, call the method.
You can get the current context by calling the method.
This function can only be invoked from the UI thread.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void BeginImageContextWithOptions (MonoTouch.CoreGraphics.CGSize size, bool opaque, nfloat scale);

.method public static hidebysig pinvokeimpl ("/System/Library/Frameworks/UIKit.framework/UIKit" as "UIGraphicsBeginImageContextWithOptions" winapi)void BeginImageContextWithOptions(valuetype MonoTouch.CoreGraphics.CGSize size, bool opaque, valuetype System.nfloat scale) cil managed

Docs.param: Size of the image context.
If true, the bitmap created is opaque, otherwise it has an alpha channel.
Scale factor to apply to the bitmap. If the value specified is zero, the device's scale factor is used.
Docs.summary: Creates a new image context and makes it the current graphics context, allowing the control of the alpha channel and the scaling factor (for Retina Display contexts).

remarks.para: UIKit keeps a stack of image context, this method creates a new image context, makes it the default and places it at the top of the graphic context stacks.
To restore the previous graphics context, call the method.
You can get the current context by calling the method.
This function can only be invoked from the UI thread.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void BeginPDFContext (MonoTouch.Foundation.NSMutableData data, MonoTouch.CoreGraphics.CGRect bounds, MonoTouch.Foundation.NSDictionary documentInfo);

.method public static hidebysig void BeginPDFContext(class MonoTouch.Foundation.NSMutableData data, valuetype MonoTouch.CoreGraphics.CGRect bounds, class MonoTouch.Foundation.NSDictionary documentInfo) cil managed

Docs.param: Object that will hold the resulting PDF from the drawing operations.
Specifies the PDF size If the rectangle is empty, this creates a page configured to be 8.5x11 inches.
Dictionary containing extra information for creating the PDF.
Docs.summary: Creates and new PDF context and makes it the current graphics context, saving to an NSMutableData object.

remarks.para: UIKit keeps a stack of contexts, this method creates a new PDF context, makes it the default and places it at the top of the graphic context stacks.
To complete the use of this graphics context, call the method.
You must call the before producing any pages.
You can get the current context by calling the method.
This function can only be invoked from the UI thread.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void BeginPDFContext (string file, MonoTouch.CoreGraphics.CGRect bounds, MonoTouch.CoreGraphics.CGPDFInfo documentInfo);
.method public static hidebysig void BeginPDFContext(string file, valuetype MonoTouch.CoreGraphics.CGRect bounds, class MonoTouch.CoreGraphics.CGPDFInfo documentInfo) cil managed

Docs.param: File where the PDF will be stored.
Specifies the PDF size If the rectangle is empty, this creates a page configured to be 8.5x11 inches.
Optional configuration information in the CGPDFInfo.
Docs.summary: Creates and new PDF context and makes it the current graphics context, saving the results to the specified file.

remarks.para: UIKit keeps a stack of contexts, this method creates a new PDF context, makes it the default and places it at the top of the graphic context stacks.
To complete the use of this graphics context, call the method.
You must call the before producing any pages.
You can get the current context by calling the method.
This function can only be invoked from the UI thread.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void BeginPDFContext (string file, MonoTouch.CoreGraphics.CGRect bounds, MonoTouch.Foundation.NSDictionary documentInfo);
.method public static hidebysig void BeginPDFContext(string file, valuetype MonoTouch.CoreGraphics.CGRect bounds, class MonoTouch.Foundation.NSDictionary documentInfo) cil managed

Docs.param: File where the PDF will be stored.
Specifies the PDF size If the rectangle is empty, this creates a page configured to be 8.5x11 inches.
Dictionary containing extra information for creating the PDF. Ideally, you can use the overload that uses the CGPDFInfo strong type instead of this overload.
Docs.summary: Creates and new PDF context and makes it the current graphics context, saving to a file.

remarks.para: UIKit keeps a stack of contexts, this method creates a new PDF context, makes it the default and places it at the top of the graphic context stacks.
To complete the use of this graphics context, call the method.
You must call the before producing any pages.
You can get the current context by calling the method.
This function can only be invoked from the UI thread.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void BeginPDFPage ();
.method public static hidebysig void BeginPDFPage() cil managed

Docs.summary: Starts a new page using the bounds from the initial PDF context.
Docs.remarks: Does nothing if the current context is not a PDF context

MemberSignature.Value: public static void BeginPDFPage (MonoTouch.CoreGraphics.CGRect bounds, MonoTouch.Foundation.NSDictionary pageInfo);
.method public static hidebysig void BeginPDFPage(valuetype MonoTouch.CoreGraphics.CGRect bounds, class MonoTouch.Foundation.NSDictionary pageInfo) cil managed

Docs.param: Media box bounds for the new page.
Dictionary of extra options to configure the PDF page.
Docs.summary: Starts a new page with the specified parameters.
Docs.remarks: Does nothing if the current context is not a PDF context

MemberSignature.Value: public static void EndImageContext ();
.method public static hidebysig pinvokeimpl ("/System/Library/Frameworks/UIKit.framework/UIKit" as "UIGraphicsEndImageContext" winapi)void EndImageContext() cil managed

Docs.summary: Pops the current image context.

remarks.para: UIKit keeps a stack of image context, this method pops the current image context, and makes the new context at the top of the stack, the new default context.
If the current context was not created using the or this method does nothing.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void EndPDFContent ();
.method public static hidebysig void EndPDFContent() cil managed

Docs.summary: Closes the PDF context and pops it from the stack.

remarks.para: UIKit keeps a stack of contexts, this method pops the current PDF context, and makes the new context at the top of the stack, the new default context.
If the current context was not a PDF context this method does nothing.

MemberSignature.Value: public static MonoTouch.CoreGraphics.CGContext GetCurrentContext ();
.method public static hidebysig class MonoTouch.CoreGraphics.CGContext GetCurrentContext() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the current graphics context

remarks.para: This returns the current graphics context (the context at the top of the stack). This is only valid after you have pushed a new graphics context with one of the methods in this class.
This function can only be invoked from the UI thread.

MemberSignature.Value: public static MonoTouch.UIKit.UIImage GetImageFromCurrentImageContext ();
.method public static hidebysig class MonoTouch.UIKit.UIImage GetImageFromCurrentImageContext() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the contents of the current context as an image.
Docs.returns: An image, or null on error

remarks.para: This method is only valid if the current context (the context at the top of the stack) is an image context.
This function can only be invoked from the UI thread.

Docs.summary: Return the current bounds for the PDF page.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void PopContext ();
.method public static hidebysig void PopContext() cil managed

Docs.summary: Pops the top context and sets the previous context as the default context.

remarks.para: This function can only be invoked from the UI thread.
